price: Dirilerle ölüler de bir değildir. Allah dilediğine işittirir. Sen kabirlerde olanlara işittiremezsin
arabic: وَمَا يَسۡتَوِي ٱلۡأَحۡيَآءُ وَلَا ٱلۡأَمۡوَٰتُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُسۡمِعُ مَن يَشَآءُۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ بِمُسۡمِعٖ مَّن فِي ٱلۡقُبُورِ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā yastawī al-aḥyāu walā al-amwātu inna al-laha yus'miʿu man yashāu wamā anta bimus'miʿin man fī al-qubūri
